PathOfBuilding.Notes:
==================================================================================================================== GENERAL TIPS ====================================================================================================================
^xC8C8C8-Bandits : Help Alira -> respec for extra skill point late
The items in this guide are are a GUIDELINE, listed with the main core stats you're looking for. More/higher stats (resists, attributes, etc) are always better! It doesn't matter which piece of gear you get your resistances on as long as you cap them. You want overcap for Exposure, which is 25% resistances over the maximum.
Major Pantheon : Brine King Minor Pantheon : Garukhan until shock effect implicits, then swap to Ralakesh for mapping / Ryslatha for bossing
^x70FF70==================================================================================================================== LEVELING ====================================================================================================================
^7^7^7^xD02090Regex to type in vendor search : g-g-r|g-r-g|r-g-g|g-g|g-r|r-g|nne|r-r-r^7
^7-=WEAPON CRAFTING=-
It is very important to keep upgrading your weapon bases from lvl 12 onwards by either : - Using an Essence of Contempt - Using Rustic sash recipe
The recipe is done by vendoring Weapon + ^xFFFF77Rustic Sash ^7+ Blacksmith's Whetstone. You can also use a magic ^x8888FFRustic Sash^7 if you do not have a bad essence available to get a rare one. Do not use Alchemys on Rustic Sashes, you want to keep those to buy gems or to get better gear before maps.
NOTE that you only start using recipe from lvl 12 bases onwards, it isn't worth doing on early weapon bases.
Here are the weapon bases you want to look for (prioritize swords until lvl 23):
1-8 : Corroded Blade 8-12 : Longsword - Jade Chopper 13-23 : Woodsplitter (First bases you want to rustic sash recipe or essence) 23-33 : Double Axe 33-49 : Shadow Axe 49-60 : Labrys 60 : Sundering Axe 64 : Vaal Axe
You start seeing these bases at the town vendor 1 level before you can use them, so if you haven't dropped one make sure you check vendors 1 level in advance to get your base ready.
You should always try to use rare axes from Shadow axe onwards as you can craft %physical damage, so either use Contempts essences, or Alchemy orbs if you're desperate and feel weak. The reason we try not to use Alchemy Orbs is that you need them to craft on your gear to enter maps, as well as buy gems and maps.
Also keep in mind that when upgrading weapons it might not be worth to change it at the next tier if your current tier is very well rolled. In that case you just skip the next tier and upgrade only at the following one. As you get closer to maps and 62+ bases you also want to avoid wasting Contempt Essences if possible since they will very easily make your early mapping weapon once you have the base.
-=ACCURACY=-
This will be a notable issue unless you get lucky with the gear you find. Buy precision from Nessa in Act 1 as soon as possible so you can use it if your accuracy start dropping too low (below 90%)
Normal lab should help with keeping accuracy up and a single piece of gear that rolls an ok accuracy roll should make life a lot easier, just keep track of your hit chance in the character stats to decide wether or not you need to use and level up your precision. Keep it as low level as possible as high level precision will reserve too much mana.
^7-=LEVEL 1-12=-
We use Spectral Throw up until Merveil where we swap Sunder instead and use it until we get Ground Slam of Earthshaking in Merc lab. Make sure you have 1 sapphire ring and upgrade flasks to make Merveil a lot easier.
-=LEVEL 12-Merc lab=-
Sunder should take you all the way to merciless lab.
The gems in each category are listed in order of importance so use that as referece point for which to prioritize if you have socket issues. Also use your own judgement on what is most valuable to you at the time.
^x70FF70^x7070FF ^xB97123^x70FF70==================================================================================================================== AXE CRAFTING ==================================================================================================================== ^xD02090 ^7GOOD BASES : Ezomyte Axe, Despot Axe
I recommend crafting on Vaal Axes and you can use a Sundering axe early if you're weapon needs upgrading before you get access to Vaal axe, they should be the best middle ground between high base damage and not too low attack speed for gameplay to feel bit smoother
The item levels you are looking for :
T3 : 73+ T2 : 77+ T1 : 83+
Make sure your filter differentiates between these item levels, it is important to have a decent amount of axes to craft on.
^7-= Entering Maps =-
Your first Axe is very straight forward, we'll craft on a Sundering Axe or a Vaal Axe. Your options are :
- Use an Essence of Contempt and craft %physical damage if there's an open prefix, craft attack speed if it already hit %phys. - Just alch it and if it has decent mods, crat %phys or speed and go with it - If you have a Regal orb, alteration spam until you hit a decent flat phys roll, then regal and craft phys. ONLY DO THIS IF YOU HAVE LOTS OF ALTERATIONS, average of 40 to hit something good.
You do not need a very good axe at all to start mapping so don't worry too much about your first axe, just pick whichever option works at the time
-= Mid Tier Axe =-
Once you start mapping Contempt essences should help you get a mid tier weapon pretty quickly. Use Contempts on the base of your choice until you get something good It's very simple, big physical number = good. Just make sure you press alt to check if there is a free prefix to craft %phys or free suffix to craft attack speed.
Also use all your Screaming Essences of Contempt as well as any Zeal Essence on your weapons to get your mid tier Axe.
If you have Regals and Granite Flasks you can also alteration spam and use the recipe (Weapon with flat phys + Granite flask + 1 Orb of Augmentation). It will give you a magic Axe with a higher tier of flat phys which can go up to Tempered (T2 flat phys), next steps are : - Aug + Regal - Veiled orb to try to hit Phys prefix - Craft attack speed
^xB97123^7-= Late game Axe =-^7^7
Now once you get a decent mid tier axe which should be the type of axe I have listed in the basic gear set, you can work on a bigger one. There are 4 stats you want to be rolled decently : %phys + %phys/acc hybrid + Flat Phys + Atk speed -- Once you hit 3 of these you can craft the last one (except hybrid, which makes it the most valuable one to hit)
Here's the process to craft the ENDGAME axe from the pob :
1- Spam Essences of Contempts (Defeaning ideally) until you hit a decent hybrid %phys roll, tier 4 roll is good enough for a first endgame axe, with an open prefix (attempt to annul if it isn't) 2- Craft Prefixes cannot be changed 3- Veiled orb 4- If it hits a Prefix and you unveil %phys proceed to the next step, if not restart 5- You can finish right there by crafting attack speed, or if you want better :
- Prefixes cannot be changed ---> Reforge speed until you hit T2/T1 speed
^x70FF70
==================================================================================================================== BELT CRAFTING ====================================================================================================================^7
Fertile catalyst ilvl 84+ Stygian vise then :
1- Spam Shrieking+ Essences of Dread until you hit T1 life with a free prefix 2- Prefixes cannot be changed ---> Reforge Chaos or any element depending on what you want 3- If the prefixes fill, restart 4- If the suffix hits a good resistance, Prefixes cannot be changed -> Veiled orb 5- If it unveils a prefix or removes the resistance, restart. If it unveils a resistance, proceed 5- Block suffix (by crafting anything) -> Hunter exalt and hope for %life 6- Craft suffix
Minimum cost : 4 divines
The abyss jewel should be craft with Harvest (Reforge Life and Reforge Lightning)
^x70FF70==================================================================================================================== RINGS CRAFTING ====================================================================================================================^7^7
You will need a ring with Accuracy and 1 resistance on it with an open suffix, then :
1- Suffixes cannot be changed ---> Reforge chaos, it will guarantee Chaos resistance, if it is good enough roll proceed 2- Suffixes cannot be changed ---> Veiled chaos 3- If it unveils Life, craft Elreon to finish ; you can also Warlord Exalt for melee dmg / % armour
^x70FF70^x70FF70
==================================================================================================================== CHEST / GLOVES / BOOTS / HELM ====================================================================================================================^7^7
Hit up your boy Rog or spam essences on stuff until it hits
For boots spam Screaming+ Essences of Torment
The rest are just basic life and resists items so use essences, harvest reforges, pick them off the ground or buy them off trade for a few chaos
^xADAA47^xFFFF77=================================================================================================================== BETRAYAL ===================================================================================================================^7^xFFFF77
^7Most important unveils to look for (in no particular order) :
- Phys/impale - Chaos hybrid resistances - Mana cost reduction => ^xE05030Target Elreon ^7- Movement speed / Avoid chill => ^xE05030Target Rin^7 - Damage while leeching => ^xE05030Target Vorici^7
Members you can kick early on to get Gravicious and Rin in : Guff, Haku, Tora, It That Fled, Cameria, Janus, Jorgin, Vagan
^xAF6025=================================================================================================================== UNIQUES ===================================================================================================================^7^xFFFF77
^7^7Good early uniques to look out for :
- Wyrmsign - Sinvicta's Mettle - Belt of the Deceiver - Carnage's Heart - Obscurantis
To target farm ^xD02090Hinekora's Sight and ^xD02090Writhing Jar^7 :
- ^xB97123^xE05030Riker^7^7 in ^xE05030^x8888FF^xC8C8C8^xB97123^x70FF70Fortification^7^7^7^7^7 - ^xE05030Elreon^7 in ^x8888FF^xC8C8C8^x70FF70Research^7^7^7 - Pick up all Unique amulets to use ^x3F6DB3Ancient orbs^7 on them ( cannot do this for ^xD02090Writhing Jar^7 ) - Ghosted Exiles are also a good way to get more uniques, but it can be dangerous (can do them in lower tier maps to be safe)
^xD02090Replica Hinekora's Sight ^xD02090^7however is farmed in Heist
^xAF6025================================================================================================================ WATCHER'S EYE ================================================================================================================
^7Pride : Impale Chance / Inc Phys Precision : %Damage or %Attack speed
^7
